description.db:para: Persistent dialog information for the dialog module. More information can be found at: &KAMAILIO_MOD_DOC;dialog.html

column.name: id
column.description: unique ID

column.name: hash_entry
column.description: Number of the hash entry in the dialog hash table

column.name: hash_id
column.description: The ID on the hash entry

column.name: callid
column.description: Call-ID of the dialog

column.name: from_uri
column.description: The URI of the FROM header (as per INVITE)

column.name: from_tag
column.description: The tag parameter serves as a general mechanism to identify a dialog, which is the combination of the Call-ID along with two tags, one from participant in the dialog.

column.name: to_uri
column.description: The URI of the TO header (as per INVITE)

column.name: to_tag
column.description: The tag parameter serves as a general mechanism to identify a dialog, which is the combination of the Call-ID along with two tags, one from participant in the dialog.

column.name: caller_cseq
column.description: Last Cseq number on the caller side.

column.name: callee_cseq
column.description: Last Cseq number on the caller side.

column.name: caller_route_set
column.description: Route set on the caller side.

column.name: callee_route_set
column.description: Route set on on the caller side.

column.name: caller_contact
column.description: Caller's contact uri.

column.name: callee_contact
column.description: Callee's contact uri.

column.name: caller_sock
column.description: Local socket used to communicate with caller

column.name: callee_sock
column.description: Local socket used to communicate with callee

column.name: state
column.description: The state of the dialog.

column.name: start_time
column.description: The timestamp (unix time) when the dialog was confirmed.

column.name: timeout
column.description: The timestamp (unix time) when the dialog will expire.

column.name: sflags
column.description: The flags to set for dialog and accesible from config file.

column.name: iflags
column.description: The internal flags for dialog.

column.name: toroute_name
column.description: The name of route to be executed at dialog timeout.

column.name: req_uri
column.description: The URI of initial request in dialog

column.name: xdata
column.description: Extra data associated to the dialog (e.g., serialized profiles).
